description:
Luffy needs just 10 minutes to recharge! Nami comes to rescue with the help of the Homies! Meanwhile, Sanji learns the terrible truth of Germa`s power - and his father`s dark history!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Angry Sanji! The Secret of Germa 66!
Ikari no Sanji: Germa Double Six no Himitsu
Sanjis Zorn! – Das Geheimnis der Germa 66!
Un Sanji furieux. Le secret du Germa 66
怒りのサンジ ジェルマ66[ダブルシックス]の秘密
